useCase.name: Perform Various Actions by Actor Foo1
useCase.description: Include different types of interactions by directing Foo1 to the appropriate element type.

mainSequence.step: Foo1 directs action towards a boundary element Foo2.
Foo1 commands a control element Foo3 for specific tasks.
Foo1 interacts with an entity Foo4 for processing data.
Foo1 instructs database operations within element Foo5.
